text:
RepoPulse forecast (7-day breakout watchlist)

Method: reproducible baseline model using public GitHub signals (no LLM).
Breakout = +max(200 stars, +50%) within 7 days.

1) affaan-m/everything-claude-code | 97% | stars now 33038 → est 64023 (range 63900-64146)
   https://github.com/affaan-m/everything-claude-code
2) forrestchang/andrej-karpathy-skills | 95% | stars now 1165 → est 10558 (range 10533-10583)
   https://github.com/forrestchang/andrej-karpathy-skills
3) different-ai/openwork | 95% | stars now 7712 → est 12882 (range 12830-12934)
   https://github.com/different-ai/openwork
4) VoltAgent/awesome-moltbot-skills | 94% | stars now 2356 → est 9955 (range 9930-9980)
   https://github.com/VoltAgent/awesome-moltbot-skills
5) coreyhaines31/marketingskills | 94% | stars now 5045 → est 8890 (range 8852-8928)
   https://github.com/coreyhaines31/marketingskills

Daily forecasts are logged publicly, then scored 7 days later (hits, misses, calibration).
#opensource #software #datascience #forecasting #github
